alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:10PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY WINDS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS... CHELAN AND WESTERN OKANOGAN COUNTIES... At 909 PM PDT, emergency management reported gusty winds located along a line extending from 35 miles west of Oroville to 9 miles north of Stehekin to 7 miles south of Chelan. Movement was west at 45 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with these storms. Winds may result in a brief visibility reduction from blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Chelan, Merrit, Holden Village, Stehekin, Chumstick, Entiat, Twisp, Pateros, Winthrop, Telma, Klipchuck Campground, Trinity, Flat Campground, Mystery Campground, Ardenvoir, Moore, Pine Flat Campground, Lake Wenatchee Campground, Thirtymile Campground, and White Pine Campground. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 67 and 93. U.S. Highway 97 in Washington between mile markers 218 and 256.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
